title: Future wars will be multi-domain, tech-driven: CDS Anil Chauhan
description: General Chauhan spoke about a new phase of military transformation, which he described as “convergence warfare”, driven by technologies such as artificial intelligence, robotics, quantum computing, hypersonics, advanced materials and data analytics | Mumbai news
content: MUMBAI: The nature of warfare is undergoing a fundamental transformation, with future conflicts expected to be fought across multiple domains such as cyber space, space, the electromagnetic spectrum and the cognitive space, said chief of defence staf... [3996 chars]

title: Delhi High Court protects 'Dhurandhar' star R Madhavan's personality rights, orders takedown of objectionable content
description: The high court also restrained several defendants from using the personality traits of Madhavan through the use of artificial intelligence and deepfake technology and ordered the takedown of certain obscene content
content:
The Delhi High Court on Monday protected the personality rights of Bollywood actor R Madhavan by restraining several websites and online platforms from illegally using his name or images for commercial gain without his consent.

title: AI ‘Bill of Rights’ emerges in State Senate
description: News Service of Florida — In a priority of Gov. Ron DeSantis, a Senate Republican on Monday filed a proposal dubbed the “Artificial Intelligence Bill of Rights.”
content:
News Service of Florida — In a priority of Gov. Ron DeSantis, a Senate Republican on Monday filed a proposal dubbed the “Artificial Intelligence Bill of Rights.”

title: New York Times reporter sues Google, xAI, OpenAI over chatbot training
description: An investigative reporter best known for exposing fraud at Silicon Valley blood-testing startup Theranos sued Elon Musk's xAI, Anthropic, Google , OpenAI, Meta Platforms and Perplexity on Monday for using copyrighted books without permission to train their artificial intelligence systems.
content:
Sign up here.
The lawsuit is one of several copyright cases brought by authors and other copyright owners against tech companies over the use of their work in AI training. The case is the first to name xAI as a defendant.

title: Railway authorities detect fake unreserved tickets created with AI
description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Dec 22: For the first time, cases of fake UTS unreserved tickets created with the help of Artificial Intelligence (AI) have come into light in Jammu Division of the Northern Railway. These were detected during a special drive launched in Jammu Division after a case of fake ticket created using the AI came into light in the Jaipur Division of North Western Railway. Under this campaign, more than 2200 (UTS) unreserved tickets were checked across all railway […]
content:
Excelsior Correspondent
JAMMU, Dec 22: For the first time, cases of fake UTS unreserved tickets created with the help of Artificial Intelligence (AI) have come into light in Jammu Division of the Northern Railway.

description: China’s push to be a weather superpower has seen authorities accelerate efforts to end reliance on a European dataset, promoting a homegrown alternative for the era of artificial intelligence-fueled forecasting.
